ingredients: 3  eggs,   +   1/2 cup butter, softened,   +   1/2 cup white sugar, 1 teaspoon lemon zest, 1 cup all-purpose flour,   +   1/2 teaspoon baking powder, 1   +   1/4 cups plums, pitted and quartered
nutrition: Total Fat 14g 17%, Saturated Fat 8g 40%, Cholesterol 100mg 33%, Sodium 139mg 6%, Total Carbohydrate 28g 10%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 15g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 3mg 14%, Calcium 35mg 3%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 86mg 2%
